answers.answer: There are many cause, from increase use to medical problems, such as diabetes.Dr. O.

question: 10 months ago I had 20/20 vision wearing only 1 monovision contact in right eye. About 2-3 months ago I noticed that my eyesight was blurry & hard to read almost anything. Had eye exam & my vision had changed to 20/40 in 10 months. What could cause this ? My eye Dr told me to get a complete physical which I will do next week.
title: change eyesight in short time
